svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_6) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/12.0.1 Safari/605.1.15" version="9.4.6" editor="www.draw.io" type="google"><diagram id="be8c31a1-955c-a31d-60c0-b4b9756a08d3"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 158px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

p.span: Additional funding is available to train the apprentice in level 2 English and maths.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 27px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 21px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 804px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: Checking what English and maths training the apprentice should undertake.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 178px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: They do not require English and maths training.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 27px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 178px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.p: They must work towards level 2 English and maths.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 21px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 27px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 27px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 175px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: We will fund functional level English and maths below level 2 where the provider has assessed that the learner needs such training.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 178px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: Review on case-by-case basis: the apprentice must achieve entry level 3 functional English and maths.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 21px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 178px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: The apprentice must achieve the minimum required standards in English and maths.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 185px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: Must study for level 2 English and maths. If failed to achieve, they must train for and achieve level 1 English and maths. We will not fund level 1 training.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 175px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: Must study for and achieve level 1 English and maths which we may fund. Then, they must start study toward level 2 which we may also fund.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 27px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 21px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 21px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 27px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 21px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 175px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 185px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.p: Does their English and maths qualifications satisfy the standard or framework?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 175px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: special educational need, learning difficulty or disability?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 175px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.p: Due to this, will they NOT be able to achieve English and/or maths to the minimum level?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 175px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.p: Are they operating below level 1 AND they do not have level 1 or 2 English and maths?

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(11, 12, 12); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 175px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

p.span: Are they operating below level 1 AND have approved qualifications?
